snippet.title: Lights out along O'Connell St
snippet.content: A POWER outage is affecting all the traffic lights along a busy street in North Adelaide. The outage was first reported earlier this morning and has left 268 households without power. Among other streets affected are Main North Rd, Tynte St, George St and Chapel St. Police are asking the public to avoid the area where possible. SA Power Networks estimate electricity should be reconnected by about 7.15am. The cause of the outage is not yet known.
